attributes.action: Egypt: Sanctions against the members of SCAF
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of peaceful pro-democracy demonstrators have been killed by the Egyptian miliary after General Al-Sissi removed the elected leader President Morsy after one year in office.

The miltary junta under the Supreme Council of Armed Forces (SCAF) has commited horrific massacres that involved shooting so far 3000-3500 peaceful demonstrators.

We petition the United Kingdom to place economical, travel and political sanctions in response to these massacres on the following members of the Supreme Council of Armed Forces (SCAF).

-Egyptian National Council (ENC)
